name: TECHNO MINDZ File Sharing Bot
description: file sharing bot store posts and it can access by special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

START_MSG.description: Custom start message let owner decide
START_MSG.value:
𝗛𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗼 {first}

𝗜 𝗖𝗮𝗻 𝗦𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗰𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗹 𝗔𝗻𝗱 𝗢𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗖𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗜𝘁 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸
Any Queries Ask Here @TechnoMindzChat

𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝘆 @TMMAINCHANNEL

FORCE_MSG.description: Force Sub Msg if needed add By TechnoMindz

CUSTOM_CAPTION.description: Your Own Caption For Files don't leave it empty!

APP_ID.description: your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature otherwise put 0 for disable

ADMINS.description: Admins id they can only create links, otherwise leave blank
